```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
raw_import <- read.csv("cps_00003.csv.gz")
```

```{r}
filtered <- raw_import %>%
  filter(AGE > 24,
         STATEFIP == 17,
         PENSION %in% c(1, 2, 3))

```

```{r}
filtered <- filtered %>%
  mutate(Private = ifelse(CLASSWKR == 21, 1, 0))

filtered <- filtered %>%
  mutate(Government = ifelse(CLASSWKR %in% c(25, 27, 28), 1, 0))
```

```{r}
print(colnames(filtered))
```
